alert.note: Alert for Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Warren and southeastern Northampton Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belfast, or near Easton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easton, Forks, Wilson, Nazareth, Harmony, Alpha, Belfast, West Easton, Tatamy, Bloomsbury, Riegelsville, Glendon, Old Orchard, Phillipsburg, Stockertown, Eastlawn Gardens and Palmer Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 73 and 76. Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
